mapper.select: select city_name, platformid, store_name, pay_count, new_count, total_count, pay_20_count, new_20_count from ds_newaddcus where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_newaddcus ( city_name, platformid,store_name, pay_count, new_count, total_count, pay_20_count, new_20_count, year,month,createtime ) VALUES( #{city_name},#{platformid},#{store_name},#{pay_count},#{new_count}, #{total_count},#{pay_20_count},#{new_20_count}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)), MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)), NOW() )
